home.title: Welcome to CASP Education
home.subtitle: We offer the best educational resources for Arabic
home.heroTitle: Learn Arabic in a Fun and Effective Way
home.heroDescription: Discover a wide range of books, lessons, and educational resources specially designed for learning Arabic
home.aboutDescription: We are dedicated to providing the best educational resources for Arabic learning, combining modern pedagogical methods with engaging content.
home.aboutPoint2: Interactive tools and modern learning technologies
home.aboutPoint3: Educational experts specializing in Arabic language

store.title: CASP Educational Store
store.description: Explore our wide range of educational resources designed to enhance the Arabic language learning experience.
store.printedDesc: Exercise books, stories, and printed educational curricula with high quality.
store.ebooksDesc: Interactive digital versions of our books, available anytime and anywhere.
store.cdsDesc: Interactive multimedia educational programs to stimulate auditory and visual learning.
store.toolsDesc: Visual aids, educational cards, and assistance tools for teachers and students.

teacherGuide.title: Teacher's Guide & Educational Resources
teacherGuide.description: We provide teachers with a comprehensive range of tools and booklets to effectively support Arabic language teaching in the classroom.

educationalSeries.title: Specialized Educational Series
educationalSeries.description: We offer integrated educational curricula carefully designed to meet the needs of learners at various stages.
educationalSeries.alWafiDesc: An integrated series for teaching Arabic to non-native speakers, based on a modern educational approach.
educationalSeries.alMufidDesc: A comprehensive educational series aiming to enhance linguistic and reading skills among students.

seriesDetail.feature1Desc: Interactive exercises that help consolidate linguistic concepts.
seriesDetail.feature2Desc: High-quality audio recordings to improve listening and pronunciation skills.
seriesDetail.feature3Desc: Periodic tests to measure the student's progress in the subject.

legal.privacyContent: At CASP Education, we prioritize your privacy. We collect only the data necessary to provide our educational services at the best possible quality.
legal.termsContent: By using our website and platform, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions that ensure a safe and beneficial educational experience for everyone.

footer.description: Your trusted educational partner for excellence in Arabic learning

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.thanks: Thank you for contacting us! We will get back to you soon.

placementTest.title: Interactive Placement Test
placementTest.description: Start your educational journey with the right test. We will help you determine the most suitable level for your Arabic language skills through a set of interactive questions.
